DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of JTT-654 on diabetes as well as the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of JTT-654 in type 2 diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of JTT-654 in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
